https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/wPLtLeopvyg2HgndnhwvmZsF3VO.jpg After performing a huge concert, Miku Izayoi invited Shido, Tohka and everyone for a day at a reserved indoor pool. Later at night, Shido keeps spotting a girl named Mayuri, who quickly disappeared after seeing her. Date A Live: Mayuri Judgment
